question: Peter Ebdon, a former world champion, who announced his retirement recently, is associated with which sports?
explanation:
Former world champion Peter Ebdon also nicknamed as ‘The Force’, has recently retired from professional snooker at the age of 49, owing to a chronic neck injury. 
The English professional snooker player won the World Championship title in 2002 and had won eight other prestigious ranking events, including the 2006 UK Championship, during 29 years of his sporting career. His last match was the at German Masters qualifiers last December.
